title: Vivo X Note Hands-On: A 7-inch screen with OriginOS makes for an off-beat experience
content:
Vivo launched a pair of new smartphones — one slab, one foldable — last week that are so far exclusive only to the mainland China market. While everyone’s attention has been drawn to the foldable device, the more conventional slab, named the Vivo X Note, has a couple of interesting features that set it apart

The post Vivo X Note Hands-On: A 7-inch screen with OriginOS makes for an off-beat experience appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Vivo X Note, the China-only slab phone, has a 7-inch screen, a funky OS, and a very good camera system ripped straight from the X70 Pro Plus.
